game.title: The Lost City of Eldarado
game.objective: Find the legendary city of gold
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden city deep in the jungle, filled with untold riches. Your quest is to find this fabled place and bring back its secrets.
game.reward: 10,000 gold pieces and a magical amulet granting resistance to poison

task.objective: Gather information about the lost city
task.description: Speak with the locals and gather any information you can find about the location of the lost city.
task.location: The local tavern in Puerto Viejo

task.objective: Retrieve a ancient map from the ruins of an old temple
task.description: Explore the ruins and find a map that will supposedly lead you to the lost city.
task.location: The Temple of the Moon Goddess, 3 days journey north of Puerto Viejo

task.objective: Navigate through the jungle and reach the lost city
task.description: Use the map to navigate through the dense jungle and find the lost city.
task.location: The Jungle, 5 days journey east of the Temple of the Moon Goddess
